65 million in the people's republic of china - 20 million in the soviet union - 2 million in cambodia - 2 million in north korea -1.7 million in africa -1.5 million in afghanistan -1 million in eastern europe - Ä‘Ã¢y lÃ  sá»± tháº­t báº¥t kháº£ phá»§ nháº­n (the truth about the vietnam ideological civil war (1945-1975) há»“ chÃ­ minh (nguyá»…n sinh cÃ´n) is the number one criminal to the vietnamese people. há»“, who was trained as an agent in moscow in 1923 by the red (communist) soviet union empire, was sent to china in 1924 to operate underground activities and to propagate the red totalitarianism (leninism-stalinism) in southeast asia. há»“ founded the communist party of vietnam in hong kong in february 1930, later it was renamed the communist party of indochina (vietnam-campuchia-laos) in october 1930. the communist party of indochina was a branch and under the direct guidance of the third international (communist international) of the soviet union. há»“ brought that totalitarianism into vietnam and imposed it on the vietnamese people. he established a one-party dictatorship regime, eliminated non-communist parties and carried out the bloody land reform (1953-1956) in north vietnam by the order of stalin, killing at least 172,000 people. in order to bring the whole vietnam into the soviet union's orbit, há»“ waged an ideological (nationalist-communist) civil war for 30 years (1945-1975) of which 3.8 million vietnamese people died. if the communists in the north didn't send their troops to the south to conquer south vietnam in order to communize the whole vietnam, the united states would certainly not send their fighting forces to vietnam in march 1965. the united states of america sent their troops to vietnam not to invade vietnam as the vietnamese communists said, but to protect free south vietnam and to contain the communist red wave in southeast asia. to sum up, ho had taken the wrong road that caused a catastrophe for the vietnamese people. these are undeniable facts).
